query: SELECT 'users' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM users UNION ALL SELECT 's7_submissions', COUNT(*) FROM s7_submissions UNION ALL SELECT 's7_rankings', COUNT(*) FROM s7_rankings;
